name: 創新設計（一）
description: 本課程為設計課程，藉由工作坊形式(workshop)為引導學生藉由草圖、比例模型、基本造型進行設計思考發想(design thinking)、小組討論(group discussion)、動手製作(making)的實體物件與作品發表(presentation)，引導學生實驗與創新，產生新的原創觀點。
goals: Acknowledge the design process and technology to develop innovation in design
Enrich the basic knowledge in design from different scale and discipline
Cultivate wide range of design concept for innovation design
Develop the skill of solving problems in design field
syllabus:
課程簡介 

Explore the idea of innovation design by acquiring professional knowledge of design industries to learn the design technologies and processes.  

  
課程目標 

*   Acknowledge the design process and technology to develop innovation in design 
*   Enrich the basic knowledge in design from different scale and discipline 
*   Cultivate wide range of design concept for innovation design 
*   Develop the skill of solving problems in design field 

教學進度與主題 

This class seeks for the idea of innovation in design in different scales from product to space. The enrolled students start with investigation for defining what is innovative design by searching different types of design. The first theme is “Cardboard Furniture”, which explore the possibility of utilizing corrugated cardboard paper as one of the most accessible material for designer. The second theme is “Shelter for disaster”, which investigate farther usage of corrugated cardboard to create a shelter design for the case of disaster. Students spend roughly six weeks to develop their research and design and make final presentation to determine the grade.  

  
教學進度與主題   

(1) Cardboard Furniture 

(2) Shelter for disaster
